column1: The New Reckoning was the calendar system introduced in Gondor shortly after the War of the Ring and intended to replace the Stewards Reckoning. Its chief feature was that the year began on the anniversary of the destruction of the Ring.
!Relationship to Shire Calendar (21 in leap years)
* The https://psarando.github.io/shire-reckoning Shire Reckoning project, dedicated to simulations and detailed analysis of all the calendars of The Lord of the Rings Appendix D.
